Tunable.name: DEFAULT_PROFIT_PER_TREATMENT_FOR_OFF_LOT_SIMULATION
Tunable.display: Default Profit Per Treatment For Off Lot Simulation
Tunable.description: This is used as the default profit for a treatment for off-lot simulation. Once enough actual treatments have been performed, this value becomes irrelevant and the MAX_COUNT_FOR_OFF_LOT_PROFIT_PER_TREATMENT tunable comes into use.

TunableList.name: DIFFICULTY_BONUS_PAYMENT
TunableList.description: When an NPC or player Sim treats an NPC Sim, they can get a difficulty bonus depending on the difficulty of the sickness (if it is the correct and ideal treatment for the sickness). Order is important. The list is processed in reverse order. The first threshold that passes returns the amount associated with it. Because of this, optimal order is thresholds is ordered from lesser to greater threshold values. If no thresholds pass, returned bonus amount is 0.

TunableTuple.description: A pair of payment amount and threshold that the payment applies to.

TunableTuple.name: threshold
TunableTuple.description: Value/comparison pair used to define a Threshold.

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the value.

Tunable.name: MAX_COUNT_FOR_OFF_LOT_PROFIT_PER_TREATMENT
Tunable.display: Max Count For Off Lot Profit Per Treatment
Tunable.description: The number of treatments to keep a running average of for the profit per treatment calculations during off lot simulations.

Tunable.name: UNIFORM_EMPLOYEE_FEMALE
Tunable.description: The SimInfo file to use to edit female employee uniforms.

Tunable.name: UNIFORM_EMPLOYEE_MALE
Tunable.description: The SimInfo file to use to edit male employee uniforms.

TunableList.name: VALUE_OF_SERVICE_AWARDS
TunableList.description: A threshold matrix that maps buffs to level of markup and vet skill. Order is important. The list is processed in reverse order. The first threshold that passes returns the amount associated with it. Because of this, optimal order is thresholds is ordered from lesser to greater threshold values.

TunableTuple.description: A pair of markup threshold and skill threshold-to-buff list.

TunableTuple.name: markup_threshold
TunableTuple.description: The threshold at which this item will match.

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the value.

TunableList.name: skill_to_buffs
TunableList.description: Mapping of skill threshold to the value of service that is applied. Order is important. The list is processed in reverse order. The first threshold that passes returns the amount associated with it. Because of this, optimal order is thresholds is ordered from lesser to greater threshold values.

TunableTuple.description: A pair of skill threshold to the buff that will apply if this threshold is met when the patient is billed for a vet's services.

TunableTuple.name: skill_range
TunableTuple.description: A test requiring a Sim to have a skill that is either above a threshold or within an interval.

TunableTuple.name: skill_range
TunableTuple.description: A TunableThreshold that is specifically used in Skill Range Tests to determine if a skill meets the required skill level.'

TunableTuple.name: skill_threshold
TunableTuple.description: The Threshold for the skill level to be valid.

TunableEnum.name: comparison
TunableEnum.description: The comparison to perform against the value.

Tunable.name: use_effective_skill_level
Tunable.description: If checked, then instead of using the skill's actual level, the test will use the skill's effective level for the purpose of satisfying the specified criteria.

Tunable.name: VET_CLINIC_VENUE
Tunable.description: This is a tunable reference to the type of this Venue.

Tunable.name: VET_SKILL
Tunable.description: The vet skill for reference in code. This can resolve to None if the pack providing the skill is not installed, so beware.
